Name: Rock Simulator
About the game: Level up to explore the great landscapes created by mother nature with zero responsibilities and nothing else but the wind blowing by your hard rocky surface. Listen to the relaxing sound nature has to offer in many different landscapes while earning enough stones to unlock your favorite rock skins! Start your adventure in the Plains while earning enough experience to unlock many more maps by doing what a rock does best...exist!

Meta Description: Looking for information on Rock Simulator? Check out the release date (Nov 27, 2019), developer insights from Vinoo, and a complete game summary.
